website_summaries.verdict: Despite a couple of small flaws, the Monster iSport Victory offers a great fit, is water-resistant, and one of the better sounding in-ear sports headphones out there.
pros: The Monster iSport Victory fits very securely and comfortably and is sweat-resistant and literally washable
It also delivers good sound, with strong bass and detail
An Apple-friendly inline remote and microphone is included along with a smart carrying case
cons: The headphone seals out the outside world, which can be bad if you're a runner or biker and want to hear oncoming traffic
The remote buttons are small, and the middle ControlTalk button is stiff

customer_reviews.title: The best for active people and for road warriors
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing I have weird ears and it has been impossible for me to really use any type of earbud when moving/exercising. These ROCK. No real noise cancelling system but they fit so perfectly with a great range of buds and earpieces to completely custom fit your ear the "seal" is superb. I wear them every trip (I LIVE on airplanes) and they are only slightly more noisy than my $300 HUGE over ear headphones that I no longer even carry. They take up as much room in my briefcase as my presentation pointer (actually less). Simply superb in every way!
customer_reviews.author: John G. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, sound great
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY headphones that will stay in my ear for the entire workout. Super comfortable, sound great, and eliminates almost all outside noise. Perfect for working out, sports, airplanes, anything... The only complaints I have about these (I've gone through 3 pairs): 1. the wire gets tangled/twisted SO easily...after awhile the inside wires start to get messed up and they will break. I wish they would make these with a different, more flexible/tangle free material. 2. the mic/control piece almost always stops working after a couple of months on every one that i've owned. is it the sweat? durability issue? not sure...but either way, I don't use it much so it wasn't a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Arya

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound from Monster
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 2nd pair because my first pair is starting to fray after about 3-4 years. The sound quality is pretty solid with the bass not being too heavy and the highs not being too harsh. I'm a business traveler so I really appreciate the noise isolating ear tips. Babies crying in the row behind me doesn't bother me at all with these head phones. I also run with these and they stay in my ear really well and I never have to worry about adjust them. It loses a star just because the flat wires can be annoying to pack and roll up.
customer_reviews.author: Htown Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, stays in ear, durable
customer_reviews.text: I use this primarily for working out and practicing my dance. These buds do not fall off and sound quality is pretty good. I listen to a lot of EDM and these buds work well for the type of music I like. Before this I used skullcandy buds which were half the price, but I went through 4 pairs BC when I dance and keep on taking my phone out of my pocket, the wires would twist and eventually break the wire. I've been using these Monster buds religiously and have not seen any sign of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Pocket

customer_reviews.title: Will buy from monster next time
customer_reviews.text: The device sounds fine. The mic controls do not work for this device and I believe it's probably a bad device. I have owned a pair before these and they worked flawless. This pair not so much. It appeared that this set, which was in its original package, was previously purchased and returned. This was apparent by the sticker seals that looked to be carefully removed once before and placed back with obvious wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth May Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality and worse company support ever.
customer_reviews.text: Despite the name behind this headphone and its overpriced, it has very poor quality and whats worse is the support of the company to repair the item. After couple of months of normal use (once a week on treadmill), the rubber piece covering controller fall off. As this is not significant issue I continued to use the set for another month. Few weeks later, control buttons stopped functioning followed by mic disruption. I thought to contact Monster support and they directed me to their support in Europe. Cutting the story short, I sent my piece to them in Netherlands which ended in trash. So not recommended piece to spend your money on.
customer_reviews.author: R. Chamseddine

customer_reviews.title: Stays in the ear
customer_reviews.text: Much better sound than the Yurbuds or Sennheiser brand and fits better in the ear. I am not a fan of the volume control or the clip to hold the cord. The volume control could just be eliminated. The clip to hold the cord to your clothing needs some better engineering in relation to the position where the cord splits into L & R sides. Until something better comes along this is the best I have found for running.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Quality For Your Run!
customer_reviews.text: These sound great. Nice crisp highs and pretty deep lows for in-ear phones. They stay in my ears without any adjustments having to be made during my five-mile runs. They are comfortable so I use them when cutting the grass and working in the yard as well. I have no soreness at all even after several hours of wear. They've been worth every penny for me. The 90 degree jack may not fit all phone cases, but works fine with my Otter box. I believe it also helps prevent shorting-out.
customer_reviews.author: ISay

customer_reviews.title: Might be what you're looking for
customer_reviews.text: Like many, I've tried many earbuds looking for the right combination of good sound and reliable fit. I'm not normally a fan of Monster but these do it for me. Unlike more traditional buds that either have no good securing feature other than compression or have an ungainly over-the-ear appendage, these have a small "thumb" that fits naturally into the shape of the outer ear and levers the bud into its proper position. I've been using these for awhile (a year, maybe) and have yet to lose a bud from my ear, including but not limited to while hiking, skiing, and exercising (and occasionally sleeping). Base response, separation, clarity and discrimination are all, subjectively, very good.
customer_reviews.author: Tim S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome audio/comfort, terrible product assembly quality
customer_reviews.text: "Amazing" - Volume controls stopped working within 2 months, now 9 months later earphones are about to stop working altogether as wires are exposed and sticking out near the connector end... Unbelievable, that $150 earphones from Monster would be completely falling apart in less than a year, never had this with any other headphones! It's a shame too since audio quality is great and I found them very comfortable, if only they'd keep on working! ;(
customer_reviews.author: Adonis

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend them to anyone looking for a high quality earbud ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are unreal. I read A LOT of reviews on them and they are everything they were cracked out to be. I would highly recommend them to anyone looking for a high quality earbud with mic for phone and works use. After 5 mins of fiddling with the various size pieces I was easily able to create a comfortable combo and am loving every minute they are in. To note: they do really reduce outside noise. It's almost too good at times, but for work and travel it is PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B

customer_reviews.title: The Only Headphones You Need for Working Out
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Amazing sound from earbuds. This is the only pair of earbuds that do not fall out of my ears. I usually need to wear a headband when working out in order to secure other earbud headphones, but not for these. The only flaw are that the remote control button cover gets slightly unglued and moves, but still remains fully functional. And, they needed to be delivered twice, as they never arrived the first time despite my being home at the time they were said to have been delivered. The iSport Victory headphones take a beating and sound awesome every time. Although they are expensive, they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Customer service from Monster
customer_reviews.text: Horrible Customer service from Monster. I love the Isports. They are made Cheap but the audio quality is great and you cant beat working out with these. Sadly i had to do an RMA through monster mine broke at 11months in then the ones they sent me for the replacement the control talk volume buttons dont work and they told me this is how it is now and were super rude. Monster sure could use better customer service and would benefit from making their headphones less crappy and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for workout, meh for everything else
customer_reviews.text: Good sound overall and they're definitely going to stay in your ears, almost to the point its annoying. The suction is very strong an can mutate the sound. On humid days, for whatever reason, there's a bit of static in the left ear bud. This is my second pair that's done this. If I crank the sound up enough, it covers it but it still bothers me knowing its there. I'll keep them because I love them running. Not a great set of headphones for casual listening though. I'd recommend Klipsch or Beyerdynamic.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy Monster Brand.
customer_reviews.text: Never buy Monster Brand. This product is failing and Monster will not stand by their product. I have been using this product for 1 1/2 years, they only have a one year warranty on this product. The mic stopped working at some point. I'm now getting crackling sounds due to wire failure(I've treated these things like gold). You would think if you spend this kind of money on headphones they would be willing to work with a person, but they are leaving me hanging. Bye bye Monster, never will you see another dollar from me.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Great when they worked.
customer_reviews.text: Work great. The only problem I seem to be having now, is the ear loop rotates too much. I suspect its just because they've been work no much Edit: Headphone broke after 14 months of use. The connection seems to have broken right at the 90 degree angle near the input jack. Neither headphone will produce sound unless I wiggle the connection. Spoke with Monster and they said there is nothing they can do about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I chose these because I was tired of the apple ear buds falling out of my ears, even when I'm sitting on a plane. plus the ear buds make my ears hurt. These are very comfortable/ The first time I used them I exercise walked for 5 miles. They never fell out of my ears and I never had to readjust them. The sound is quite good. Not as good as my Bose Headphones, but I cannot complain. I got these mostly for travelling, but now that it's summer I will use them for exercise as they are a lot cooler than the Bose headphones.
customer_reviews.author: RON

customer_reviews.title: The very best I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving these earphones five stars because I can't give them six. Flawless fit. Amazing sound. Never been able to find a set that fits my ears until now. I weight train. Jump rope. Sprint. And they've never fallen out. Not even when the chord gets snagged on my bench. The only time they've come out is when I'm done with them after a workout. If you're into fitness, get these. You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Arrieta

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad
customer_reviews.text: I work out everyday, these fit perfect and were comfortable and never fell out and the noise isolation was awesome, sound quality was pretty decent too. That being said, after about 5-6 months the remote cover peeled off and then the remote started to mess up, randomly pausing songs or activating siri or skipping songs. Then eventually after about a year the left earphone completely stopped working, Monster is however warrantying them as we speak, so I should get a new pair that hopefully lasts better than these did
customer_reviews.author: Cody W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars-Sound, Minus -4 Quality
customer_reviews.text: Regrettably, the right speaker only worked intermittently straight out of the box (day 1). But when they did work (intermittently), they were probably the best sounding in-ear headphones I've ever owned (and I've had many). Sent them back (thanks Amazon) and purchased a set of Bose Sound Sport headphones which sound-quality-wise was inferior compared to the iSport Victory's (when they worked). Note to Monster, PLEASE correct your QC design problems. If you do, you will have a loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: Lost on Guam

customer_reviews.title: Recommend Fully!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely the best in-ear sports headphones I've owned. They totally isolate outside noise so if you're running on the roads, you may not want to use these. They stay secure in my ears for my entire workout. They sound good as well. I've tried Yurbuds, Sennheiser, and Bose Freestyle and these surpass all of them as far as sound isolation, quality, and fit. I would definitely recommend. I do not use them with my Android phone so I am not sure how well the controls work if you don't have an iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: cnyc1

customer_reviews.title: Great but very expensive!
customer_reviews.text: These things are fantastic for people who wear glasses and/or have trouble finding an earphone that fits! In ear earphones would always keep falling out because I guess my ears are shaped weird. I purchased these for the gym because I got tired of using around the ear earphones since my hair would cover about half my ear. I looked at those sennheiser/adidas earphones but those things are massive. These things are a little bass heavy but I love it! I also found it difficult to change the different ear hooks on these but thankfully the ones that were already attached fit me.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: great for working out
customer_reviews.text: this is the most expensive headphones I ever got. I have a friend that has monster headphones but the blue ones which are cheaper. I got these because of the reviews and I workout a lot; I dont want headphones that fall out of your ear. When I got these, the packaging just blew me away and it came with so many sizes for ear buds and ear hooks. It honestly took me a week to find the best fit because I have weird ear size but it works out with all the cross fit, weight lifting and running I do. You should buy them too, and the beat on the music I like the most
customer_reviews.author: Kristen F. Starkus

customer_reviews.title: DISPOSABLE HEADPHONES!!! :/
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for Christmas and they are already broken after just using them at the gym for 3 months. There is only a 30 day return policy from Amazon; I guess that means you will not get your money back or your item replaced if it breaks or doesn't work after that 30 days is up. Doesn't seem like good business practice. ? They should call these DISPOSABLE HEADPHONES. I expected better quality for $100, and I didn't realize there would be no consumer protection from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Loved ❤️ my iSport Victory earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved my iSport Victory earbuds. They were comfortable and perfect on sound. I plug them into my iPhone and used them with my Fitbit Charge as I walked 2-3 miles each evening. They fit my ears exceptionally well, and I was amazed by the clear, crisp sound. In October, I let my 17 year old son borrow them for the first time...and he lost them 😩. I adopted my son when he was 14, and he has made great strides so I didn’t make him pay me for them. Alas! I wish I had them still 😍
customer_reviews.author: Ted Roberts

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! - Well it was until today less than a year after purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've been running in these for approx. 1 mo. now. Great fit and sound! You don't have to constantly push them back in your ears, they stay just fine. No problems with quality. Hoping they last several years. EDIT: Left channel has died after less than one year. I run in these 3-4 times per week but have never abused them in any way. Was happy with them until today. Paying over $120, the product should last. Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: STEALTH714

customer_reviews.title: Static sound and Lack of Consistent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have officially stopped using the Monster headphones and replaced them with generic apple in-ear headphones. The sound quality often has static, the headphones are hit-or-miss in terms of their ability to actually play sound. What makes this even more frustrating is their inability to be used on multiple devices (do not work on my laptop or tablet). The in-ear feel is comfortable and is a positive and when the headphones are playing properly the sound quality is positive - but what use are these features if the product if rarely is ever fully working to capacity. For $150 spend $30 on a generic pair of headphones five times over and each one of those will beat this version.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Kobernick

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall these headphones are absolutely fantastic!! I have the Bowers & Wilkins c5 and these have waay more bass which is what I was looking for. The Bowers &Wilkins C5 may have a better sound range, but are more expensive, have less bass, and are uncomfortable to where after 15 minutes of wearing. The iSport Victory headphones are pretty comfortable to wear and they have a range of sizes to fit anyone's preferences. they sound great and can get really loud( I never have my volume up all the way; I'm using an Galaxy s4). I recommend these headphones, because they stay in the ears really well, they sound better than an in ear beats, and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: carson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love these, they fit in my ear perfectly, sound is ok. However the controller is absolutely HORRIBLE. This is my 2nd pair with the same issue. The controller is hard to press and detaches after just a few months of use. This makes them practically useless. Also it's hard to run and focus on pressing firmly in a particular spot. I'm done with this brand. Costs too much to not last. Extremely disappointed again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: These did not meet my expectation, they exceeded them!
customer_reviews.text: Picked up powerbeats, over the ear style. Which unfortunately hurt my ears with the weight. What to do? My bro has the blue isports. Gave those a test with the impression, I'd order these n trade for his if they were comparable. Well, these are far and above the best ear phones I've had in a long time. Have been using Sony obey the ears for a very long time. The sound on these is clear, crisp and detailed. They are comfortable and washable. I'm an avid gardener and am tough on everything I own. These are a great replacement for portable, sportable, and washable on the go phones. Thank you isport for expanding and resetting the standard once again!
customer_reviews.author: n2games

customer_reviews.title: The volume control on these headphones will NOT work with ...
customer_reviews.text: The volume control on these headphones will NOT work with Apple products. I called Monster. Not only were they incredibly rude, but said they cancelled their contract with Apple and the volume controls will no longer work.
customer_reviews.author: E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Tone and volume are good. Comfort and ease of use also good
customer_reviews.text: Used these on walks two or three times a week. Tone and volume are good. Comfort and ease of use also good. About what I expected for the money. What I did not expect was for the cover on the small control unit to fall off one month after the warranty expired. Remarkably, the headphones still work but I'm sure it's just a matter of time . . .
customer_reviews.author: Bravo2

customer_reviews.title: Best earbuds on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best earbuds on the market! I've tried several different earbuds and these are the best. For running and exercising, they do not fall out. That is what I hate about all the other products I tried, once I started sweating, out the came. The sound quality is excellent too. When I'm traveling, they are the best for making and receiving phone calls or simply listening to music or podcasts.
customer_reviews.author: DrAux

customer_reviews.title: LIES! Controls Do Not Work with Apple Products!
customer_reviews.text: Seller states that controls work with Apple iOS: HUGE lie. I've tried these with an iPad and iphone and the Volue and Play/ Pause controlled on the headphones do not work at all. Zero. I contacted the seller and they told me it's a Manufacturer issue. Basically they are Falsely selling this as working with the popular Apple products and when you discover they do not - they push you to Monster that will inform you it's not Apple comparable. Then if you want to return given it won't work, the seller keeps 50% or more of your purchase price!! This is criminal!
customer_reviews.author: J. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: could not find headphones that would stay in my ear for a decade, all headphones suck but these ones actually stick well and stay put even if you plan to run. Great sound, sort of scary if you are in a busy streets because you won't hear anything but music since they cancel quite a bit of ambient sounds. Perfect for flying on propeller planes that make your head hurt - with music or without these are great to keep propeller sound off your brain.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sound and Fit Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for several months and they conitnue to fit and sound great. These are the best fitting plugs I have ever used... my previous phones were all behind the ear and I would have to continuously adjust during my run, but this is very comfortable and holds it's position, requiring no re-adjustment for an entire run. I'm a sweaty pig when I run, so I waited several months to write this review to see how they held up... they still function as great as day 1.
customer_reviews.author: Telly03

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and probably worth it
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very good, and they are trouble free during gym workouts. Apparently, I have an extra small ear passage and these come with different size foam covers for the ear plugs themselves that make them adjustable, plus, with the curved part that sits on the outside of the ear, they are not always falling out because of moisture & movement. I've been using them for 6 weeks now, and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.M

customer_reviews.title: OK fit, toggle never worked, lousy support
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good but unfortunately i didn't heed the warnings about the toggle switch on the cord for volume. It doesn't work and that was commented on by several other purchasers before i bought mine. I called Monster support after 30 days and they said i would have to send in the unit and wait 3 weeks to get a new one or buy a new one and wait several weeks to get a refund. Not the way to run a support organization. I don't repeat buy from any company who makes it difficult to get the product fixed. There are equal alternatives that may have better support, like Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Rich L

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Great sound. No wind noise while riding my bike. Just wished the cord was a little longer for the days that i want to use them when i'm not riding my bike and want to keep my phone in my pocket instead of my camelback. Would also be better if it could go back a track with a triple-button press like the standard iPhone headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Best earbuds I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for the last 4 years and I love them. They have fantastic sound quality and they block out a lot of background/ambient sound. They're great for the gym, airline travel, subway travel and they are great for hands-free phone use. They're also sweat/water resistant and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for about a week for running and lifting weights. So far I really like them. Found a good fit quickly with the different sized ear pieces. Very secure fit. This is the one thing I am very picky about. And I have tired numerous other products at different price points including the $150 one. Sounds fairly decent for an ear bud. Definitely good for one that has really good fit, features in-line controls, is advertised as "washable", and doesn't cost over $200. Cord is very long which for me is fine. But if you want to clip an ipod to your sleeve it will be probably be a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: DrJoel

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: If I was basing the review on sound alone I would give 5 stars in a heartbeat. They sounded great and with all of the different size ear pieces you cant go wrong. The cord was tangle free and the remote buttons worked great. Where I had to drop down the rating was the piece that holds it in your ear so it doesn't move. Although the piece itself caused no issues the base was to large for me ear. It put to much pressure on my ear so when I had them in for 30+ minutes it would cause a little nagging pain. I must have small ears because I didn't read any other reviews with this issue
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: i love these headphones. before i bought them, i did some researching on headphones that sat in your ear, and i cam across these. my ears are two different sizes, and i always had trouble with earphones because they kept falling out of one ear or the other. i love that these come with changeable parts that are different sizes, which works perfect for me. i got a perfect fit. they sit in your ears great. and the sound is amazing too. i can hardly hear anything around me at all, but i can definitely hear myself when I'm chewing food. lol.. good earphones!
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: After years of searching, I have found high quality earbuds for my workouts. These earbuds are in my opinion the best out there. Not only are they well constructed but they deliver the highest quality in regards to sound and noise isolation. The sound on these is consistent across the board and only gets better as you burn them in. While the sports clips take a minute or two to get use to- once you find the right size and fit for them, and the tips, the noise isolation and fit are second to none. Therefore, as long as they are offered my search is over!
customer_reviews.author: L2J

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these, Monster iSport is always way better and cheaper than beats, they worked out some of the durability kinks from the older models, and even under heavy stress, the only damage mine have sustained is a small split in the audio cable casing, which is easily remedied by a small piece of a electrical tape, but doesn't effect sound quality anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Cruxcrater

customer_reviews.title: Good at first...
customer_reviews.text: I loved these headphones for the first few months I had them. Fit snug in my ear, didn't need adjusting throughout workout, and the sound quality is amazing. I have had these for about 10 months now and the above statements are no longer true. I use these usually a few times a day and throughout the months the wire around the microphone has gotten severely kinked to the point where it pulls it out of my left hear. The face of the pause/skip pad has fallen off. Don't get me wrong they still work, but I think if you pay $150 for earphones they should work a little longer than 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus sessler

customer_reviews.title: I was hopeful that these would be comfortable given that others said they were successful in getting ...
customer_reviews.text: I will start this review by saying I have very difficult ears to fit earbuds into. I was hopeful that these would be comfortable given that others said they were successful in getting them to stay and feel comfortable. Unfortunately, I was not able to get them to sit well in my ears. The sound was decent and I liked the flat the cable but ultimately had to return them because I couldn't find a comfortable combination for the earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: Looking for exercise buds? These are them.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my second pair because I stood on my first pair. These things are fantastic. Amazing sound, comfortable and very solid fit for exercise (I jog with them). It can take a bit of playing around with all the attachments to get the right fit for you, but it's worth it. I'm told the mic is a bit hard for the caller to hear me over. But that's not why I bought them, so still 5 stars in my book. Can't wait for my next pair to arrive!
customer_reviews.author: ADC

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding sport headphone.
customer_reviews.text: Best in ear headphone that I have owned, and I have owned many. Cordless/bluetooth may be preferred for some but won't come close in sound quality. This product will seal off ambient sounds which can be a problem if you are for example running along a road with a lot of traffic in a big city. I generally use it while working out or running. During the summer months I sweat like a maniac and it hasn't affected this product at all. It's water resistant and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando C.

customer_reviews.title: great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I've had these a few days and they're really nice. it took a little bit to get used to the fit with the little hooks that go in your ear along with the earbuds, but once you're used to them they provide a great fit. the sound is great, too. I have to say I like the sennheiser ie 60's a little better, but that just means I would like to rate these a five and the sennheiser's a six if I could!.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are the best - and most expensive - buds I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Once you customize the hooks and ear inserts, and get used to sticking them in, these deliver audio far beyond anything I have ever experienced. Like others have said - it is TOO good sometimes, making it impossible for me to use them while running or biking - where I really need to be able to hear cars, etc. The price is high, and I hope they last long enough to justify the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RPF

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk
customer_reviews.text: These are complete trash. I use these while mowing the yard once a week and they have begun to have static in the left ear, they randomly change playback speeds on podcasts and also randomly beckon Siri. These "quirks" also happen with my wife's pair, of which she uses while running. For something with this price point, they should deliver what they advertise. Sadly, they're just trash. All that said, they're comfortable when they work, which sadly, isn't for long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sports headphones !!
customer_reviews.text: Love these iSport Victory headphones. I own a dozen pairs or more of quality sports headphones (Beats, Sennheiser, Plantronics, BeatsAudio 66, Bose, Jabra, Jaybird) and these are the pair I gravitate to most often. Comfortable fit, tight seal, overall excellent sound and really fantastic deep bass. Most definitely recommend thme !!
customer_reviews.author: James O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the quality sound is really good but the quality of the cable is not good
customer_reviews.author: ernesto

customer_reviews.title: The best running earbuds! Stay in place, great bass, incredible fit, very comfortable, adjust to ear with different pieces...
customer_reviews.text: I run a lot, and I've had a lot of headphones and earbuds over the years. I listen to a range of music, from hip hop to jazz to funk to Broadway. I really need good bass response and am accustomed to accurate, punchy sound. These earbuds offer superior sound, the best fit I've ever experienced in any earbud, and great bass response. You can't get them to clip.
customer_reviews.author: StevenC_in_NYC

customer_reviews.title: Monster iSport Victory In-Ear Headphones
customer_reviews.text: As soon as you find your size its all good. They sound great. Love the extra ear bud sizes that come with the package just in case my ears decide to grow even more, i have more options. I wouldn't normally buy beats since the pros and studio versions bleed out so much sound and i would annoy anyone around me but these and the powerbeats by dre are actually great for working out. Again stay away from the Pro's and Studio Beats by Dre. These on the other hand, are great for working out.
customer_reviews.author: jim yanez

customer_reviews.title: The best I ever run / any_sport with
customer_reviews.text: All you would expect from these earphones! The best I ever run with (ZERO trouble! - no cords entangling and the ear pieces stay in the ear and do not move) Almost zero outside world sounds (almost got ran over when cycling so watch out when on traffic roads!) Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Itai Schweitzer

customer_reviews.title: BOOM BOOM POW
customer_reviews.text: Stay in my ear, sound great, look great. Couldn't be happier. I know that the fad is the big ole over ear Beats, but I really like the light weight and breathability of these vs. the ear cover style. I've had these for about two years I think and they sound as good as the day I got them!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones, caution with amazon
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular sound quality from these earbuds, however the glue/construction of these is very poor. After several months of use mine are falling apart. The logos have fallen off as well as the cover for the volume up/down/play/pause control. I wasn't happy dealing with amazon when and additional charge from amazon marketplace appeared on my credit card and they could not 'find' the charge. All in all if they were built properly I would love the headphones, but my pair are not and I will never use Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: John Mckinnon

customer_reviews.title: PISS POOR QUALITY!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After paying $140 for these "Monster iSport" earphones I had them for less then a month before the VERY cheap plastic clasp holding one of the ear-buds together broke and made them impossible to wear. This was doubly annoying as I was on a motorcycle trip across the country and could not get them replaced in time to get my money back. I wore them only twice and always kept them in the protective case when they were not in my ears. VERY disappointed in this product. DO NOT BELIEVE THE HYPE on these things. There are MUCH more durable products out there that sound just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Shane W OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Finally an earbud that stays in place!
customer_reviews.text: Finally an earbud that stays in place. These sound great and work well for noise cancellation. I really like the various size options to get a perfect fit. My only issue is they pull out of my Samsung S7 phone too easily. I think this is because of my case.
customer_reviews.author: Tim S.

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY - went through 2 pairs in one year ...
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY - went through 2 pairs in one year. Very cheaply made. Volume control was first to go and then the wires became exposed at stress points a few months later. If you look through all the 1 star reviews you'll see the theme of same type comments. If I had a time machine I would go back and tell myself not to buy these!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Very good, only complaint is that I do a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good, only complaint is that I do a lot of cycling, if I do a long ascent, I have to briefly take the headphones out one side at a time otherwise it feels like pressure build up in my ears. But they are excellent and you won't hear anything else, I can listen to the music quieter and still hear it all. Remote only does pause and play for me but it may be due to my using a 2.5mm extension for my life proof case, using Samsung Galaxy s5
customer_reviews.author: R L LAWSON

customer_reviews.title: Everything about this product is great except I am working on the fast forward button
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product is great except I am working on the fast forward button. It appears to be stiff and as such, it takes a couple of attempts to "catch" when depressed and forward to the next song. I am hoping with use it will become easier. If not, I will drop this rating a notch.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: ...these aren't the earphones you're looking for
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, ever since Apple acquired beats the earphones that come with your device is actually pretty decent. Instead of paying for this sorry piece of equipment, I should have just went to the apple store and bought a new pair of earphones for half the price. There is absolutely no noise insolation and the sound isn't very pristine. Should just spend an extra $20-40 on some basic bose or beats earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for many months and they are great quality. Even went through the washer and dryer by accident and they still work great! The only drawback is the clicker doesn't work with my Samsung android phone like it did with iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: NWPerson

customer_reviews.title: Stay in perfectly. Microphone stopped working afer one week
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, however microphone broke after one week of usage. Needless to say, I've returned it and not going to re-order again. Too bad, because those are the only in-ear headphones that stay in place...
customer_reviews.author: Nitai

customer_reviews.title: Great earphone
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this earphone is great: the sound quality is amazing, it stays in place when I'm running or training, and outer noise gets canceled so that you really experience your own world while working out. One thing I want to say is a "miss" for the earphone is the possible poor design of the "earpiece" part where it have the rubber that locks the earphone in your ear. That part actually rubs against your earbone, causing severe pain when you have it on for close to an hour. Other than that, this is a great earphone.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding. Study
customer_reviews.text: The second pair I've owned. My dog ate the first set, otherwise I'm sure they'd still be alive. Great sounding. Study. Stay in your ears, and don't go on the fritz when you sweat on them exercising.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Booth

customer_reviews.title: Correction
customer_reviews.text: Volume control doesnt work but it isnt due to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Daniel Mickalowski

customer_reviews.title: Great ear buds
customer_reviews.text: Great ear buds, work well. Stay in really good, have nice bass. Not worth 100, my Skill Candy headphones give the same bass and sound, if not better. The only problem with the Candy's is they don't stay in as well. Buy them if you are active and don't like too much outside noise.
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: By far the best ear buds that I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: By far the best ear buds that I have ever bought. I had to buy another pair for my wife and she loves them too.
customer_reviews.author: William Pena Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds
customer_reviews.text: the headphones sound great and are a good fit. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star rating but I had to return the first set within 3 months because one of the earbuds quit working. they were replaced with no problem and I use them just about every day. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: hyatt

customer_reviews.title: These are really good
customer_reviews.text: They stay in your ears and isolate you from a lot of extraneous noise. Make sure you use the appropriate ear insert. I started with one that was too large, then reduced the size to achieve comfort. If you go too small, you'll not get as full a sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: JRK

customer_reviews.title: Great for running!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great for running or any other sport that requires a lot of movement. They do not fall out! This is a must when running, especially at races when the last thing you want to do is fight with your headphones. Ear piece is comfortable. Sound is very good.
customer_reviews.author: denise48

customer_reviews.title: Could be better!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and nice sound. Perfect for fitness. Love it. But, a bit but, the control unit fall apart after a little over 1 year of use. It really made me feel very unhappy. I had to use some duck tape to wrap it up. Besides this problem, it really makes a five star. Hopefully, the manufacture will fix the problem in the next generation.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Bi

customer_reviews.title: They are the best ear buds for working out or any activity
customer_reviews.text: I had to order these twice because the first ones I left on the plane. They are the best ear buds for working out or any activity. I could not recommend them more highly.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit and they don't move in your ear during ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit and they don't move in your ear during hard driving work outs. Great clarity and both bass and treble are very good. My second pair, one of my dogs chewed the first pairs of peices. Liked them so much I bought them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: They stay in your ear like non other. Sound good. I'm sure there is better sound out there, but this is fine sound and I love that they stay in no matter what.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S

customer_reviews.title: All you could ask for
customer_reviews.text: I cycle and sweat..a lot. I have had numerous other well known and not inexpensive brands with varied success. These have been terrific. Not only do they withstand the sweat but they sound good as well. A good investment...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Hell yeah
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a couple months and they don't budge from my ears... At all. I run and jump rope for much of my workouts and they stay put. Sound-wise, the imaging is phenomenal for the price point and things remain clear while isolating ambient noise. Add the whole waterproof thing and these are the best headphones I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: KVTShmoov

customer_reviews.title: great headphone for working out
customer_reviews.text: great headphone for working out. not detailed though. More comfortable than the previous one and more durable. sound quality of previous one was better.
customer_reviews.author: bkehnide

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound, poor construction
customer_reviews.text: Headphones sound great and fit really well, but left ear fell apart within the first few months--company exchanged for a new pair. Within a few months with the new pair, the remote control pad fell off, and the wire began to fray at the base. Waiting on my THIRD pair now. Will not buy again. Very disappointed in the quality of the construction.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: Noise isolation is stunning from a pair of ear buds. Construction is well thought out and solid. Sound quality is pretty good but base could be a little more punchy. Fit is extremely solid and am very happy overall with the iSports.
customer_reviews.author: Tool Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I lift weights every day, and can't imagine not using these. Unfortunately this is my third pair (first pair was stolen, second pair broke after about a year). I use these roughly 15 hours a week and when you switch back to Apple's headphones, you notice a world of difference. With all of the different connector pieces, you are bound to find a combination that fits in your ear.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Oman

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, poor quality - lost me as a customer
customer_reviews.text: Went through 2 of these in 2yrs. Quality problems, now out of warranty. No longer a monster customer. $120 headphones should last longer than those that come for free with my iPhone (still have the originals from every iPhone version)
customer_reviews.author: Fred Kufner

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great/blows the beats out of the water!
customer_reviews.text: Bout these headphones to wear while at the gym as well as for work. I work in a office environment and wanted to not listen to others around me. The headphones were crystal clear and fit great. I would start to feel a little pain in my ear if I wore them longer then 5 hours. They did stay in the ear very well while working out. Did I mention yet are waterproof ?!?
customer_reviews.author: Graham Malin Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: For years, I've been looking for earbuds that will stay in while exercising. Well, I finally found them! These have fantastic sound and a very comfortable fit. The build quality is exceptional. Best in-ear headphones I've ever owned. Nice job, Monster!
customer_reviews.author: Greg McBride

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product to anyone. It broke only after 7-8 month of very light use. Dealing with the company is a whole other issue. Contacted the company for warranty replacement about a month ago and got nothing. Stay away from monsters!!!
customer_reviews.author: GregZ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & great sound
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fit and the sound. I've tired every kind from cheap ( $9.00) to BOSE head set and Bose ear buds and also other higher end head phones. These are comfortable and have a great sound like no others I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: tidegirl Amazon Customer a moving story

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones for Sports
customer_reviews.text: It fits air tight to give you a great noise cancellation product. Sweat doesn't interfere with high intensity interval training. The high quality sound of these Victory headphones are magnificent. Best headphones Ive owned so far. (An the first ones in-ear headphones that actually fit )
customer_reviews.author: Russell Geofroy

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I knew these were not noise cancellation earphones and I did not want those because I walk and I needed to hear some background noise but I was able to listen to my audio books while being in a loud mall area and in other noisy environments. I love them. They are soft and fit well and do not fall out of my ear while I am exercising. i would highly recommend them for anyone looking for a good fit and noise reduction.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Hossman

customer_reviews.title: Volume/Play Buttons Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: These earphones worked well for about 2-3 months. The volume/play controller located close to the left ear bud stopped working after 3 months of use. Most likely, it was due to water ingress or a wiring issue but I'm not entirely sure. The volume/play buttons were not totally useful -- I would have liked forward/backward buttons as well.
customer_reviews.author: Classy Class

customer_reviews.title: BEST SPORT HEADPHONES I'VE EVER HAD
customer_reviews.text: BEST SPORT HEADPHONES I'VE EVER HAD. Bass 9/10, Treble 10/10, Fit 10/10, Shipment was 5 days. I've tried Beats Tour and PowerBeats and these headphones fit and sound way better than both. Very comfortable. I was hesitant on buying due to misleading reviews but I went with my gut and am glad I did. So good, I had to leave a product review for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: WHAT?!?!
customer_reviews.text: The seller was good and true to their word. The sound is good, the fit is good also after figuring out the multiple fit options for your ears. After long use 3+ hrs they do become a bit uncomfortable. The Bose Sie2 seem to be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M. Lopossa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality and won't fall out.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones. I was looking for something I could workout with (run, jump, etc.) and that would fall off. It's great! I put them on and don't have to worry about them anymore. The sound quality is great and overall quality built. Worth the extra bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: its a good head phone, im extra careful with it as i dont want it to break, only use for working out, so far it has no problems
customer_reviews.author: murdellx

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones Ever
customer_reviews.text: I got these flute my fiance for his birthday and he absolutely LOVES them! They fit very well, are comfortable, and help block out most outside noise. Considering buying another pair for myself.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Sound great!! I just wish they would block out the surrounding noise a little better !! Also a little on the expensive side!! But they do have an excellent sound!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wetwoody

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME, love them!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of headphones and I must say this are the best!!!! They work just like others have said, they stay in your ears and you cannot hear anything other the the music. They worked flawlessly when I was working out. AWESOME, love them!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: petronemi

product_meta.title: Monster Cable Earth Wind and Fire Gratitude in-Ear Headphones (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: iSport Victory raises the bar on the already amazing Immersion with a new, super-comfortable earhook design, updated OmniTip for an even more unshakeable fit and powerful, pulse pounding audio unlike any other sport headphone. Pure Monster Sound and superior noise isolation keeps the user focused on the most intense workouts and extreme outdoor sports. Monster's iSport Victory In-Ear Headphones delivers the ultimate high-performance sport headphone: rugged, sweat proof and washable. The Pro Sound-Isolating Eartips ensure a tight seal blocking out water and leaving in that deep, pulse-pounding sound. Whether you're running, biking, training or snowboarding, you'll go further and never lose focus, thanks to iSport Victory's revolutionary in-ear SportClip design. Secure and comfortable, it won't fall out or get in the way of your goggles, glasses or helmet. Sweat proof and washable Protective clasp pouch
feature_bullets: Patented SportClip stays in your ear
Control talk in-line mic with controls for ipad, iphone and ipod

specifications.Item model number: MH ISRT VIC IE GR CA WW
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars566 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
